subtitle: Prime Connect: Your gateway to career growth, operational excellence, and community at Prime Hotels.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.mission: At Prime Hotels, we believe that true hospitality starts from within. We are dedicated to creating an environment where every team member feels valued, supported, and inspired to deliver their best.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.desc: Access world-class training modules and resources to sharpen your skills every day.

leadership.title: Leadership Pathways
leadership.desc: Clear career progression and mentorship programs to help you become the leader of tomorrow.

community.title: Knowledge Community
community.desc: Share insights, collaborate across departments, and build lasting professional relationships.
